body.title: Join Our Mission to Revolutionize Observability
body.description: Build the future of observability with a team that values innovation, collaboration, and impact.

body.title: Why Work With Us
body.description: At OpenObserve, we're committed to creating an environment where you can do your best work.

items.title: Work-Life Balance
items.description: Flexible working hours and generous time off to ensure you stay refreshed and motivated.

items.title: Innovation Focus
items.description: We encourage creative thinking and provide time for exploration and experimentation.

items.title: Growth Opportunities
items.description: Continuous learning with individual budgets for conferences, courses, and certifications.

items.title: Inclusive Culture
items.description: A diverse and supportive environment where all voices are heard and valued.
items.icon: <path d="M16 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-4-4H6a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v2" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="9" cy="7" r="4" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M22 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-3-3.87"stroke-width="2" /><path d="M16 3.13a4 4 0 0 1 0 7.75" stroke-width="2"/>

items.title: Remote-First
items.description: Work from anywhere with a distributed team spanning multiple time zones and countries.
items.icon: <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M12 2a14.5 14.5 0 0 0 0 20 14.5 14.5 0 0 0 0-20" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M2 12h20"stroke-width="2"/>

items.title: Competitive Benefits
items.description: Comprehensive health coverage, retirement plans, and competitive compensation packages.
items.icon: <path d="M16 20V4a2 2 0 0 0-2-2h-4a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v16" stroke-width="2"/><rect width="20" height="14" x="2" y="6" rx="2" stroke-width="2"/>

body.title: Globally Distributed Team
body.description: Our team spans across continents, bringing diverse perspectives and round-the-clock innovation.

features.title: 20+ Countries
features.description: Team members across North America, Europe, Asia, and Australia
features.icon: <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M12 2a14.5 14.5 0 0 0 0 20 14.5 14.5 0 0 0 0-20" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M2 12h20"stroke-width="2"/>

features.title: 24/7 Coverage
features.description: Continuous development and support across all time zones
features.icon: <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke-width="2"/><polyline points="12 6 12 12 16 14" stroke-width="2"/>

features.title: Multiple Languages
features.description: Our team communicates in 10+ languages, bringing global perspectives

features.title: Local Expertise
features.description: Deep understanding of regional markets and technical requirements

body.mapText: Work from anywhere in the world

body.title: Hear From Our Team
body.description: Our employees are our greatest asset. Here's what they have to say about working at OpenObserve.

items.quote: Working at OpenObserve has been the highlight of my career. The problems we solve, the engineering culture, and the constantly growing team of brilliant colleagues.
items.name: Jamie Smith

items.quote: The culture at OpenObserve is truly special. There's a perfect balance of autonomy and accountability. I feel empowered about our wellbeing and growth.
items.name: Raj Patel

items.quote: As a remote employee, I was worried about missing out on the connection and camaraderie. But the art of building strong relationships is cultivated at the core of this company.
items.name: Elena Lopez

body.description: We're building cutting-edge technology that solves real problems in observability. Here's what you'll work with:

features.title: Modern Stack
features.description: Our platform is built with Rust, Go, and TypeScript, leveraging the best tools for performance, reliability, and developer experience.

features.title: Cloud Native
features.description: We embrace Kubernetes, containerization, and cloud-native principles to build scalable, resilient systems.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: We believe in the power of open source and contribute back to the community that supports us.

body.title: Ready to Join Us?
body.description: We're looking for passionate individuals to help us build the future of observability. Check out our open positions and apply today.

seo.title: Careers at OpenObserve
seo.description: Discover exciting career opportunities and join the OpenObserve mission to build the future of observability.
